Purpose: To analyze MS biomarkers—including oligoclonal bands, IgG index, and neurofilament light chain—to aid in the diagnosis and monitoring of multiple sclerosis.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) for serum; sterile screw-cap tube for CSF
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., ELISA reader, nephelometer) and apparatus for isoelectric focusing and immunoblotting
